author: dantraMSFT
body: This is an ongoing work item to remove ETW events and associated wrapper code for events that are specific to the full clr.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Could you please point examples of a code we should clean up?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
@iSazonov this is an example: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Security/security/ExecutionPolicyCommands.cs#L236-L239

title: Remove ETW events used only by Full CLR code.
